summary: A rich brat and a poor chap try to woo a girl, with their rivalry culminating in the most prestigious college event - the marathon cycle race.
cast: Aamir Khan|Ayesha Jhulka|Deepak Tijori|Pooja Bedi|Kulbhushan Kharbanda|Mamik Singh|Kiran Zaveri|Ahmed Khan|Ravindra Kapoor|Deb Mukherjee|Aditya Lakhia|Deven Bhojani|Miki Khan|Prakash|Sooraj Thapar|Bobby Khanna|Sanam Oberoi|Shehnaz Kudia|Siraj Syed|Sharokh Bharucha|Imran Khan|Asrani|Ajit Vachani|Anjan Srivastav|Robin Bhatt|Salim Khan Ding-Dong|Maria Goretti|Jatin Pandit|Prakash Ramchandani|Girija Shettar|Shekhar Shukla|Amole Gupte|Faisal Khan
title: Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar
